com.psddev.cms.tool
Class ToolPageContext

java.lang.Object
  com.psddev.dari.util.WebPageContext
      com.psddev.cms.tool.ToolPageContext

public class ToolPageContext
extends com.psddev.dari.util.WebPageContext

WebPageContext with extra methods that work well with pages in Tool.

pageParam

public <T> T pageParam(Class<T> returnClass,
                       String name,
                       T defaultValue)
Returns the parameter value as an instance of the given returnClass associated with the given name, or if not found, either the page setting value or the given defaultValue.

Deprecated. Use Query.from(java.lang.Class) instead.

getToolByClass

public <T extends Tool> T getToolByClass(Class<T> toolClass)
Returns the singleton instance of the given toolClass. Note that this method caches the result, so it'll return the exact same object every time within a single request.

getCmsTool

public CmsTool getCmsTool()
Returns the CMS tool.
